name: Auto: Verdant Breeze
description:
Your Swirl reactions deal +1 DMG.
After you trigger Swirl reactions: Your characters and Summons deal +1 Elemental DMG for that Elemental Type this Round.
descriptionraw: Your Swirl reactions deal +1 DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After you trigger Swirl reactions:</color> Your characters and Summons deal +1 Elemental DMG for that Elemental Type this Round.
